String.Source: Pardon me sera, but are you by chance familiar with the person frequents the marsh?
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，先生，但你是否正好熟知正好认识一个沼泽住民？

String.Source: I believe he is an Argonian like yourself, but a legendary knight from a great company of fighters.
String.Dest: 我相信他是个像你一样的亚龙人，但传说中的骑士来自一个杰出的战士组织。

String.Source: My apologies, my lady, perhaps you could use the dagger to threaten timid men who are too polite to smack your bottom.
String.Dest: 我的错，女士，或许你可以用把匕首来威胁那些太过于礼貌以至于没胆子来拍你屁股的害羞男人们。

String.Source: Ingarte, a woman of your...sizable assets should not be without protection from the local ruffians.
String.Dest: 印卡塔，一个像你一样……富有的女人，可不该没有地痞的保护。

String.Source: I could craft you a near weightless dagger which you could slip into your waistband.
String.Dest: 我可以帮你打造一把轻便的匕首，你可以把它藏你的腰带里。

String.Source: You rattled off that story like it was prepared in advance.
String.Dest: 你慌乱地结束那个故事，像是事先准备好的。

String.Source: Unless you have some sort of proof, I suggest you leave, sera.
String.Dest: 除非你已经有一些证据，要不然我建议你马上离开，先生。

String.Source: What about the one on your table?
String.Dest: 那你桌上的那一把呢？

String.Source: Alas, sera, that's not for sale. I like to keep a sample for any skeptical customers who might doubt the sword's utility.
String.Dest: 啊，先生，这把是非卖品的。我想保留一把被顾客质疑的剑作为样本。

String.Source: What about the one on your table?
String.Dest: 那你桌上的那一把呢？

String.Source: It also serves as an example of my previous work with which I can compare craftsmanship.
String.Dest: 它可以与我过去做的弯刀做比较，让我的技术更精进。

String.Source: What about the one on your table?
String.Dest: 那你桌上的那一把呢？

String.Source: Without it, I cannot be certain whether the quality has been degraded by the tools I have at my disposal.
String.Dest: 没有它，我可说不准会不会因为这些破烂的工具而给我的手艺拖后腿。

String.Source: Your shop seems to be infested with bees.
String.Dest: 你这家店是不是被蜜蜂占领了。

String.Source: Oh, that. You may not have noticed, but there's a large beehive stuck to the roof over the firewood.
String.Dest: Oh, that. You may not have noticed, but there's a large beehive stuck to the roof over the firewood.

String.Source: Your shop seems to be infested with bees.
String.Dest: 你这家店是不是被蜜蜂占领了。

String.Source: I was going to take it down, but Agni begged me to let the infernal things live. With most children, I tend to ignore such petulance.
String.Dest: I was going to take it down, but Agni begged me to let the infernal things live. With most children, I tend to ignore such petulance.

String.Source: Your shop seems to be infested with bees.
String.Dest: 你这家店是不是被蜜蜂占领了。

String.Source: After all, children may be noisy as nirnroot, but their memories are as fickle as a brothel wench.
String.Dest: 毕竟，小孩都会像奈恩根一样吵闹，但他们的记忆就像家妓院里的妓女一样变幻无常。

String.Source: Your shop seems to be infested with bees.
String.Dest: 你这家店是不是被蜜蜂占领了。

String.Source: With Agni having lost both her parents and that child in the fire, well, Falion thought it best not to add to her loneliness.
String.Dest: 阿格尼已经从火灾失去了她的父母，所以，法利昂觉得最好不要再让他感到孤独寂寞。

String.Source: For all I know you looted it off one of your dead brothers.
String.Dest: 我看这东西事你从你死掉的兄弟们身上捡来的吧。

String.Source: I don't have to subject myself to your slander, even if you are a customer. Either buy something or get out.
String.Dest: 就算你是一个客人，我也没理由接受你的诋毁。不买就滚蛋！

String.Source: This blacksmith, this Nord, he is a master.
String.Dest: 那个诺德铁匠，他是个大师。

String.Source: Perhaps I should ask my Alik'r friends what they think of your excuses.
String.Dest: 也许我该问问我的阿利克尔朋友对你的解释有什么意见。

String.Source: No, wait! You're right. I haven't been completely honest with you. As you say, I am not what I seem.
String.Dest: No, wait! You're right. I haven't been completely honest with you. As you say, I am not what I seem.

String.Source: What if I wanted to craft a scimitar. Can you train me?
String.Dest: What if I wanted to craft a scimitar. Can you train me?

String.Source: You might as well ask me to turn wind into rain, and the moons into stars.
String.Dest: You might as well ask me to turn wind into rain, and the moons into stars.

String.Source: What if I wanted to craft a scimitar. Can you train me?
String.Dest: What if I wanted to craft a scimitar. Can you train me?

String.Source: The blacksmiths in Hammerfell dedicate nearly half their lives to learning their craft.
String.Dest: 落锤省的铁匠利用出他们近半生的时间去增进他们的手艺。

String.Source: What if I wanted to craft a scimitar. Can you train me?
String.Dest: What if I wanted to craft a scimitar. Can you train me?

String.Source: And yet you wish for me to pass this knowledge as if it were the time of day. I am no sorcerer, sera.
String.Dest: And yet you wish for me to pass this knowledge as if it were the time of day. I am no sorcerer, sera.

String.Source: I was under the impression a good craftsman never blames his tools.
String.Dest: 我的印象是，一个优秀的工匠从来不会抱怨他的工具不称手。

String.Source: If that were the case, I could trade my hammer for a club and smelt iron with a stove. On no, I'm afraid you are mistaken, sera.
String.Dest: 按你说的话，如果把槌子卖掉换成根棍子，然后用火炉炼铁也没问题咯？不，恐怕你搞错了，兄弟。

String.Source: I was under the impression a good craftsman never blames his tools.
String.Dest: 我的印象是，一个优秀的工匠从来不会抱怨他的工具不称手。

String.Source: Tools matter every bit as the man.
String.Dest: 工具的重要性跟使用它的人不相上下。

String.Source: How's business?
String.Dest: 生意如何？

String.Source: Slow. Agni suggested I put on a public demonstration in Solitude, but I told her I'm a blacksmith, not a warrior.
String.Dest: Slow. Agni suggested I put on a public demonstration in Solitude, but I told her I'm a blacksmith, not a warrior.

String.Source: How's business?
String.Dest: 生意如何？

String.Source: I'm not sure she understands the distinction.
String.Dest: 我不知道她到底明不明白这有什么区别。

String.Source: How's business?
String.Dest: 生意如何？

String.Source: Benor came by the other day asking if I made "those curved Akaviri weapons." The ignorance of these brutes continues to astound me.
String.Dest: Benor came by the other day asking if I made "those curved Akaviri weapons." The ignorance of these brutes continues to astound me.

String.Source: How's business?
String.Dest: 生意如何？

String.Source: He probably saw my desert garb and assumed I was a Khajiit.
String.Dest: He probably saw my desert garb and assumed I was a Khajiit.

String.Source: How's business?
String.Dest: 生意如何？

String.Source: Business is fine, but home is a bit tense. With all the talk about Falion, you'd think Jonna would step up to defend him.
String.Dest: Business is fine, but home is a bit tense. With all the talk about Falion, you'd think Jonna would step up to defend him.

String.Source: How's business?
String.Dest: 生意如何？

String.Source: Although I sympathize. Cruel as it sounds, Falion can take care of himself, and sometimes business has to come before family.
String.Dest: Although I sympathize. Cruel as it sounds, Falion can take care of himself, and sometimes business has to come before family.

String.Source: How's business?
String.Dest: 生意如何？

String.Source: Not well. I am in need of more customers. Although I have heard of an Argonian knight who braves the marsh south of the Folgunthur ruins.
String.Dest: Not well. I am in need of more customers. Although I have heard of an Argonian knight who braves the marsh south of the Folgunthur ruins.

String.Source: How's business?
String.Dest: 生意如何？

String.Source: Perhaps sera, you would be so kind as to recommend my wares to him.
String.Dest: Perhaps sera, you would be so kind as to recommend my wares to him.

String.Source: Are you the local blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你是本地的铁匠吗？

String.Source: Yes sera, I own The Curved Sword. I know it doesn't look like much, but in time it will be the finest specialty shop in all of Skyrim.
String.Dest: Yes sera, I own The Curved Sword. I know it doesn't look like much, but in time it will be the finest specialty shop in all of Skyrim.

String.Source: Nobody in Skyrim fights on horseback.
String.Dest: 在天际省里没人骑马战斗的。

String.Source: Not today sera, but tomorrow, tomorrow they may.
String.Dest: 今天是没人这么做，先生，但不代表以后也不会有。

String.Source: Specialty shop?
String.Dest: 专卖店？特产店？

String.Source: You heard right sera. The idea is to make this the only place in Skyrim that specializes in quality swords and armor native to Hammerfell.
String.Dest: You heard right sera. The idea is to make this the only place in Skyrim that specializes in quality swords and armor native to Hammerfell.

String.Source: Specialty shop?
String.Dest: 专卖店？特产店？

String.Source: Unfortunately, it's been hard to get equipment shipped here to Morthal, even with the East Empire Company a stone's throw away.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，要把设备运来墨索尔城这里是十分困难的，即使东帝国公司是离这里不远。

String.Source: Specialty shop?
String.Dest: 专卖店？特产店？

String.Source: So as of now I can only sell what I can craft with the limited equipment I have here.
String.Dest: 所以我现在我只能用这些有限的设备锻造东西。

String.Source: Falion let you set up near his home?
String.Dest: 法利昂让你在她家旁边开店？

String.Source: That's right. It's not an ideal location, with the inn on the other side of town, and rumors about Falion don't exactly attract my sort of customer.
String.Dest: 对。这里不是理想的地方，这的旅店都在镇子的另一边，还有些关于法利昂的谣言对我的顾客造成不利的影响。

String.Source: Falion let you set up near his home?
String.Dest: 法利昂让你在她家旁边开店？

String.Source: That being said, the very same rumors make Falion more welcoming to outsiders. Being a fellow Redguard doesn't hurt either.
String.Dest: 话虽这么说，但同样的谣言却使得法利昂外更受外来人的欢迎。成为一个红卫人的同伴没什么坏处。

String.Source: Falion let you set up near his home?
String.Dest: 法利昂让你在她家旁边开店？

String.Source: Not to mention spellswords can use his enchanting table to embolden the weapons they purchase at my shop.
String.Dest: 更不用说佣兵可以用他那张附魔台来强化那些在我店里买的武器了。

String.Source: Falion let you set up near his home?
String.Dest: 法利昂让你在她家旁边开店？

String.Source: So like I said, all in all not an ideal situation, but not entirely a bad one. That, and he's the only one who had the space.
String.Dest: 所以就像我说的，虽然一切都不是很理想，但也并不完全糟糕。而且他是唯一一个有地方借我的人。

String.Source: What do the rumors about Falion say?
String.Dest: 关于法利昂的谣言是什么？

String.Source: Oh, the townsfolk say he raises the dead and molests children or something absurd like that.
String.Dest: 哦，那些村民都说他会做些召唤死尸、猥亵儿童之类的荒谬事。

String.Source: What do the rumors about Falion say?
String.Dest: 关于法利昂的谣言是什么？

String.Source: Which is what happens when you're a master conjurer and choose to adopt a small child. As if mages can't be fathers too.
String.Dest: Which is what happens when you're a master conjurer and choose to adopt a small child. As if mages can't be fathers too.

String.Source: My mistake. I suppose I'm just naturally suspicious.
String.Dest: 我错了。我想我只是太多疑了。

String.Source: These are suspicious times, sera, and caution isn't necessarily a weakness.
String.Dest: 现在是个多疑的年代啊，先生，小心点也不一定是错的。

String.Source: My mistake. I suppose I'm just naturally suspicious.
String.Dest: 我错了。我想我只是太多疑了。

String.Source: It seems, however, that many in this land are cautious to trust, but hasty to judge. Make sure you don't make the same mistake.
String.Dest: 可是看起来，这儿的人会很谨慎的决定相信什么，但却会做出草率的判断。你一定不要犯同样的错误。

String.Source: Curved swords. They use those in Hammerfell.
String.Dest: Curved swords. They use those in Hammerfell.

String.Source: Right you are, sera. They're the pride of Hammerfell, but I assure you, we don't make them as an affectation.
String.Dest: Right you are, sera. They're the pride of Hammerfell, but I assure you, we don't make them as an affectation.

String.Source: Curved swords. They use those in Hammerfell.
String.Dest: Curved swords. They use those in Hammerfell.

String.Source: Curving the blade is ideal for slashing, while at the same time concentrating the pressure of the edge on a specific area.
String.Dest: 一个弯曲的刀身是最理想的，因为它会把两旁的压力全部集中在一点上。

String.Source: Curved swords. They use those in Hammerfell.
String.Dest: Curved swords. They use those in Hammerfell.

String.Source: The edge cuts clean and with less resistance, and won't get stuck in your opponent like an axe or straight edge blade.
String.Dest: 一个平滑的切割面伴随着更少的阻力，使它不会像斧头或直刃剑一样卡在你的敌手身上。

String.Source: Curved swords. They use those in Hammerfell.
String.Dest: Curved swords. They use those in Hammerfell.

String.Source: Trust me, that is not a pretty sight if you're fighting on horseback.
String.Dest: 相信我，如果骑在马上战斗发生这样的事可就完了。

String.Source: Interesting. I'd like to buy one.
String.Dest: 听起来很不错。我想买一把。

String.Source: Unfortunately, I have yet to furnish this place with a proper forge, and haven't yet begun the process of crafting them.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，我还没找到一个合适的熔炉去锻造它们。

String.Source: Interesting. I'd like to buy one.
String.Dest: 听起来很不错。我想买一把。

String.Source: Cheap Nord weapons can be forged with just an anvil, but a scimitar is not just any sword.
String.Dest: 那些劣质的诺德武器虽然也是在铁砧上锻造出来，但弯刀可不仅仅是一把武器这么简单。

String.Source: Interesting. I'd like to buy one.
String.Dest: 听起来很不错。我想买一把。

String.Source: My brothers in Hammerfell would scorn the smith who dare forego the delicate process created by our forefathers.
String.Dest: 我在落锤省的兄弟们都对那些偷工减料的锻造师表示不屑。

String.Source: The bees aren't that big of deal. I've only been stung eight times so far.
String.Dest: The bees aren't that big of deal. I've only been stung eight times so far.

String.Source: That many? I wonder if it's possible to charge you for them.
String.Dest: That many? I wonder if it's possible to charge you for them.

String.Source: I get it. You couldn't cut in Hammerfell so you go where there's no competition.
String.Dest: 我懂了。你无法销入落锤省所以跑去找些没人竞争的地方。

String.Source: You wound me sera. The blade you see before you is proof of my skill. Any Redguard from here to Hegathe will vouch for its craftsmanship.
String.Dest: You wound me sera. The blade you see before you is proof of my skill. Any Redguard from here to Hegathe will vouch for its craftsmanship.

String.Source: Well, I've met an Orc bard, so I guess anything's possible.
String.Dest: 呃，我遇见了一个兽人吟游诗人，这让我觉得天底下没有不可能的事。

String.Source: Ah, you've met Lurbuk. Someone should really take the rocks out of his throat.
String.Dest: 啊，你见过卢布克了。某人唱歌前真该先把他喉咙里的石头拿走。

String.Source: Well, I've met an Orc bard, so I guess anything's possible.
String.Dest: 呃，我遇见了一个兽人吟游诗人，这让我觉得天底下没有不可能的事。

String.Source: Ah, you've met Lurbuk. A shame what happened to him. A terrible bard, but he did manage to steer business in my direction.
String.Dest: 啊，你见过卢布克了。发生在他身上的事真是各种羞耻。一个糟糕透顶的吟游诗人，却成功让我的生意一落千丈。

String.Source: So what happened to the blacksmiths?
String.Dest: 那么那个铁匠出了什么事？

String.Source: Many of us were forced to become farmers...or worse. At least the men were saved the indignity of becoming a tavern wench.
String.Dest: 我们中的许多人被迫成为了农民……或者更糟。但至少那个人使我们免受成为酒馆应侍这种侮辱。

String.Source: So what happened to the blacksmiths?
String.Dest: 那么那个铁匠出了什么事？

String.Source: When Ulfric started his rebellion, I stowed on the first ship to Solitude like a fly chasing manure.
String.Dest: 当乌弗瑞克开始他的叛乱时，我踏上头一艘开往孤独城的船，行疾如飞的追赶着这帮渣渣。

String.Source: So what happened to the blacksmiths?
String.Dest: 那么那个铁匠出了什么事？

String.Source: Of course, the other smiths thought I was crazy. They said burly Nord men would not go for such an elegant weapon. I aim to prove them wrong.
String.Dest: 当然，我们家的其他人都认为我疯了。他们说高大魁梧的诺德人不会想要那么一件秀气的武器。我打算证明他们是错的。

String.Source: Aren't your skills needed in Hammerfell? What if the Thalmor invade?
String.Dest: 你的锻造技能在落锤省没什么用场？如果梭默入侵呢？

String.Source: Actually, the Thalmor are precisely why I'm here in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 其实，梭默正是我来天际省的原因。

String.Source: Aren't your skills needed in Hammerfell? What if the Thalmor invade?
String.Dest: 你的锻造技能在落锤省没什么用场？如果梭默入侵呢？

String.Source: As Summerset Isle and Hammerfell are divided only by a narrow sea, many say that our kingdom is the vanguard in the defense against the Aldmeri.
String.Dest: 由于夏暮岛和落锤省只是被一道狭窄的海峡分隔开，很多人说我们的省份是抵挡梭默入侵的先锋部队。

String.Source: Aren't your skills needed in Hammerfell? What if the Thalmor invade?
String.Dest: 你的锻造技能在落锤省没什么用场？如果梭默入侵呢？

String.Source: During the height of the war, blacksmiths were said to be in high demand as the Dominion spread its tendrils over the southern coast.
String.Dest: 在战事最纷乱的时候，铁匠是个高度需求的职业，因为梭默已经延伸到南部海岸一带。

String.Source: Aren't your skills needed in Hammerfell? What if the Thalmor invade?
String.Dest: 你的锻造技能在落锤省没什么用场？如果梭默入侵呢？

String.Source: However, after the Second Treaty of Stros M'kai was signed, there became a surplus of weapons and a sudden shortage of Thalmor.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，在斯图尔斯·麦凯岛第二条约签署过后，这里就产生了武器过生，梭默短缺的尴尬局面。

String.Source: Curved swords? What's next, square shields?
String.Dest: 弯刀？接下来，方盾吗？

String.Source: You jest, but you only mock yourself. After all, it's the nature of men to jape at what they don't understand.
String.Dest: 继续嘲笑吧，但这只会显得你更愚蠢。毕竟，人就只会嘲笑一些他们不了解的事情。

String.Source: I don't think you're a smith. This is all some ruse to move cheap scimitars.
String.Dest: 我知道你不是铁匠。这不是为了转移 cheap scimitars而耍的伎俩。

String.Source: That's an absurd accusation sera, and I suggest you find some proof before you make them again, lest I call the guards. Good day.
String.Dest: 这是个荒谬的指控！我建议你在说话前拿点证据出来，免得我去叫守卫来。再见。

String.Source: I can take care of the bees.
String.Dest: 我会处理那些蜜蜂的。

String.Source: Yes, but can you handle the sobbing of a young girl?
String.Dest: 是的，但你忍心看一个小女孩的哭泣吗？

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: Authentic goods, crafted by a blacksmith of Hammerfell.
String.Dest: Authentic goods, crafted by a blacksmith of Hammerfell.

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: Blades, helmets, pretty much anything that suits your needs.
String.Dest: 武器啊，盔甲啊，差不多你需要的应有尽有。

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: Looking to protect yourself, or deal some damage?
String.Dest: 在找保护自己的东西，还是砍人的东西？

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: Take a look.
String.Dest: 随意看看。

String.Source: An interesting story. If that's truly the case, then I'll let you be.
String.Dest: An interesting story. If that's truly the case, then I'll let you be.

String.Source: I thank you for your discretion, sera.
String.Dest: 感谢你的这么说，先生。

String.Source: I have a contact at the East Empire Company. He supplies me with the scimitars, but I assure you, they're legitimately made.
String.Dest: I have a contact at the East Empire Company. He supplies me with the scimitars, but I assure you, they're legitimately made.

String.Source: The blacksmith happens to be very skilled, but wishes to remain anonymous. My contact all but implied he was a Nord.
String.Dest: The blacksmith happens to be very skilled, but wishes to remain anonymous. My contact all but implied he was a Nord.

String.Source: If the Alik'r were to come and see the quality of this craftsmanship, they would demand that I construct more for the coterie.
String.Dest: 如果阿利克尔的人来了见到我这身技艺，他们一定会问我要不要招揽更多人手来帮助。

String.Source: I've picked up the blacksmith trade to maintain appearances, but as you can imagine, my scimitars lack the proper balance.
String.Dest: 我扛下了铁匠商的招牌，但就如你想像的，我的弯刀还缺乏适当平衡。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 贵安。

String.Source: Hm?
String.Dest: 嗯？

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
String.Dest: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
